constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 54 (Tuesday, March 23, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. LATTA:
H.R. 2151.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 1:
The Congress shall have Power . . . to pay the Debts and
provide for the common Defense and general Welfare of the
United States.
Article I, Section 8, Clause 18:
The Congress shall have Power to make all Laws which shall
be necessary and proper for carrying into Executive the
foregoing Powers, and all other Powers vested by this
Constitution in the Government of the United States, or in
any Department or Officer thereof.
[Page H1622]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

title: Hire Veteran Health Heroes Act of 2021
